channel.title: Project Cerberus - (Getting a Team)
channel.description: Hello there, i've started coding a source recently, and it looks too good for releasing. So far it's got full herblore with potions that you drink and then drain. Full runecrafting with rune essence and altars, and much much more. Such as full moving npc's. Good drops, and more.. I'm looking for a server programmer to program with me.. (Must be amazing, mainly client work.) A client programmer. A site programmer. Please add my msn hani-rules@hotmail.co.uk For applications.. (Do not make an application if you can't code well, our programmers must be well established, able to code from scratch, and to make complex codes.)

item.title: Project Cerberus - (Getting a Team)
item.dc:creator: @Z0D14C Z0D14C
item.description:
@Z0D14C wrote:

Hello there, i’ve started coding a source recently, and it looks too good for releasing.
So far it’s got full herblore with potions that you drink and then drain. Full runecrafting with rune essence and altars, and
much much more. Such as full moving npc’s. Good drops, and more…
I’m looking for a server programmer to program with me… (Must be amazing, mainly client work.)
A client programmer.
A site programmer.
Please add my msn hani-rules@hotmail.co.uk
For applications…
(Do not make an application if you can’t code well, our programmers must be well established, able to code from scratch,
and to make complex codes.)

Read full topic
